The leader of education
since 2000

                     Dr. Raj Singh (a renowned educationist, former Reader & Head of Chemistry Department in Udai Pratap Autonomous College, Varanasi) has established a society named Swami Atulanand Rachana Parishad' to fulfil desire beneath the brainwave of his spiritual guide Swami Atulanand Ji Maharaj in the Year 1979. To serve humanity by way of imparting education.
